info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 1:09PM MST until December 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow bands expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Snow bands will be capable of intense snowfall rates greater than 1 inch per hour for short periods of time. * WHERE...Butte/Blackfoot Region. Interstate 90 Bearmouth to Butte. Highway 12 Garrison Junction to MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will combine with gusty winds to reduce visibility and create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
